# Copilot Instructions for blackbeard-extension

## Project Overview
Minimal hello-world GitHub Copilot Extension for learning the Extensions API.

## Architecture
- `index.js` - Single entry point: Express server for Copilot Extension
- `package.json` - Dependencies

## Code Style
- JavaScript (Node.js), Express.js
- Keep minimal and educational
- Follow Copilot Extensions API message format
